description: This file defines a Java interface named MockDevice with methods related to device properties such as name, UUID, manufacturer, model, hardware version, firmware version, and online status. It also includes import statements for two classes from the device.cluster package.

classes.name: MockDevice
classes.description: An interface representing a mock device with properties such as name, UUID, manufacturer, model, hardware version, firmware version, and online status, along with methods to access and modify these properties.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the device.

methods.name: getUUID
methods.description: Returns the UUID of the device.

methods.name: getManufacturer
methods.description: Returns the manufacturer of the device.

methods.name: getModel
methods.description: Returns the model of the device.

methods.name: getHardwareVersion
methods.description: Returns the hardware version of the device.

methods.name: getFirmwareVersion
methods.description: Returns the firmware version of the device.

methods.name: isOnline
methods.description: Returns whether the device is currently online.

methods.name: setOnline
methods.description: Sets the online status of the device.
